name: Tshift
tagline: A simple way to use shift selection for your checkboxes
body:
tShift, What is this? --------------------- tShift is a jquery plugin that allows you to use shift selection in your checkboxes.
It was built using the jQuery library. Author ------ Copyright (c) 2012 Alfredo Berumen Saldivar
http://alfredberumen.com
@berumen How to use ---------- Include tShift plugin in your website directory then load files in the section of your HTML document. Don't forget to add the jQuery library version 1.6+. Just put your checkbox list inside a div with an id, use whatever name you wish for the id. You can use nested divs inside your main div. For example:
Select 1
2
3 4 5
